item.title: [j21] Altar of the Goyf
item.description:
Tribal Artifact — Lhurgoyf

Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of card types among cards in all graveyards.

Lhurgoyf creatures you control have trample.

item.title: [j21] Alseid of Life's Bounty
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Nymph

Lifelink

{1}, Sacrifice Alseid of Life's Bounty: Target creature or enchantment you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Allied Assault
item.description:
Instant

Up to two target creatures each get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

item.title: [j21] Alirios, Enraptured
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

Alirios, Enraptured enters the battlefield tapped.

Alirios doesn't untap during your untap step if you control a Reflection.

When Alirios enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 blue Reflection creature token.

item.title: [j21] Alchemist's Greeting
item.description:
Sorcery

Alchemist's Greeting deals 4 damage to target creature.

Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [j21] Alchemist's Gift
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains your choice of deathtouch or lifelink until end of turn. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it. Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

item.title: [j21] Ainok Bond-Kin
item.description:
Creature — Dog Soldier

Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)

Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.

item.title: [j21] Aeve, Progenitor Ooze
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Ooze

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. Copies become tokens.)

Aeve, Progenitor Ooze isn't legendary if it's a token.

Aeve enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Ooze you control.

item.title: [j21] Aetherstream Leopard
item.description:
Creature — Cat

Trample

When Aetherstream Leopard enters the battlefield, you get {E} (an energy counter).

Whenever Aetherstream Leopard attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Aethershield Artificer
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Artificer

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

item.title: [j21] Aeromunculus
item.description:
Creature — Homunculus Mutant

Flying

{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

item.title: [j21] Aeromoeba
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Beast

Flying

Discard a card: Switch Aeromoeba's power and toughness until end of turn.

item.title: [j21] Adaptive Snapjaw
item.description:
Creature — Lizard Beast

Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

item.title: [j21] Acolyte of Affliction
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Acolyte of Affliction enters the battlefield, mill two cards, then you may return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [j21] Accursed Horde
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

{1}{B}: Target attacking Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

item.title: [j21] Abzan Falconer
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)

Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

item.title: [j21] Abzan Battle Priest
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)

Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.

item.title: [j21] Abnormal Endurance
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

item.title: [j21] Abiding Grace
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your end step, choose one —

• You gain 1 life.

• Return target creature card with mana value 1 from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [j21] Abandoned Sarcophagus
item.description:
Artifact

You may cast spells that have a cycling ability from your graveyard.

If a card that has a cycling ability would be put into your graveyard from anywhere and it wasn't cycled, exile it instead.

item.title: [mid] Consider
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

Draw a card.

item.title: [mid] Play with Fire
item.description:
Instant

Play with Fire deals 2 damage to any target. If a player is dealt damage this way, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [mid] Infernal Grasp
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [mid] Wrenn and Seven
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Wrenn

+1: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

0: Put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

−3: Create a green Treefolk creature token with reach and "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control."

−8: Return all permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand. You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1109261525

item.title: [mid] Join the Dance
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

Flashback {3}{G}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Join the Dance
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

Flashback {3}{G}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Instant

Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [mid] Champion of the Perished
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Whenever another zombie enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Perished.

item.title: [mid] Triskaidekaphile
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

You have no maximum hand size.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly thirteen cards in your hand, you win the game.

{3}{U}: Draw a card.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly thirteen cards in your hand, you win the game.

item.title: [j21] Goblin Dark-Dwellers
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

Menace

When Goblin Dark-Dwellers enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

https://www.comicsbeat.com/exclusive-preview-unleash-new-goblins-in-magic-arenas-jumpstart-historic-horizons/

item.title: [j21] "Benalish Partisan"
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Lifelink

Whenever you cycle another card, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return "Benalish Partisan" from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and it perpetually gets +1/+0.

Cycling {1}{W}

https://twitter.com/death_snow/status/1422420691916181508
